name: 鄭林合
objective: 引導電機系的同學對計算機科學作全面的了解，期使同學除了應用PC與microcontroller 之外，對於計算機科學其他重要課題如:Computer organization, Algorithms, Data compression, ArtificialIntelligence, security,...等，也有基本的認識。
schedule:
week 1. Introduction
week 2. Computer organization
week 3. Data representation
week 4. Number representation
week 5. Operations on bits
week 6. Programming languages
week 7. Data structures 
week 8. Algorithms
week 9. Computer networks 
week 10. Operating system
week 11. Software engineering
week 12. Abstract data type
week 13. File structures
week 14. Databases
week 15. Data compression
week 16. ArtificialIntelligence, security
week 17. Theory of computation
materials:
TextBook:
Fundations of Computer Science
Author : Behrouz Forouzan
歐亞書局
